loans.use: to buy raw materials, such as combed wools

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Don Wilfredo es un señor de 48 años, casado, originario del municipio de El Sauce, padre de familia de dos hijas, se graduó como Ingeniero Ecológico porque le apasiona la ecología, las plantas.

Actualmente se desempeña como Director del área de capacitación en una Institución privada donde imparte charlas sobre temas relacionados al medio ambiente.

Uno de sus grandes sueños es ver preparadas a sus dos hijas y tener una vivienda con todas las condiciones para darle una vida digna a su familia, por eso se esfuerza día a día para ejercer un buen trabajo y tenerlo por varios años.

Debido a los bajos salarios que se ganan en Nicaragua las personas muchas veces necesitan de los créditos para poder cumplir sus sueños, por tal motivo está solicitando un crédito en Ceprodel y pide el apoyo a los inversionistas de Kiva para poder mejorar el piso de su vivienda con el cual comprará cerámica, cemento y pago de mano de obra.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is a 48-year-old gentleman who is married and comes from the municipality of El Sauce. He is the father of two daughters. He graduated as an Environmental Engineer, because he is passionate about ecology and plants. 

He currently works as director of the training division of a private institution, where he gives talks on topics related to the environment. 

One of his great dreams is to see his two daughters educated and to have a house with all of the conditions to give his family a dignified life. For this reason he works hard day by day to carry out his work well and keep his job for many years. 

Due to the low salaries earned in Nicaragua, people often need loans so that they can achieve their dreams. For this reason he is requesting a loan from Ceprodel and asking for support from the Kiva investors so that he can improve the floor of his home. With the loan he will buy ceramic tile and cement and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy ceramic tiles and cement and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Yader Eulogio

texts.es:
El joven Yader Eulogio es originario de una comarca ubicada a 20 km del municipio de El Sauce donde no existe energía eléctrica solamente agua proveniente de pozos y ríos.

Es padre de familia de una niña a la que ha tratado de dar lo mejor en cuanto a condiciones de vida y esto lo ha logrado laborando como profesor de primaria en la escuela de la misma comunidad.

Con el fin de mejorar la salud de su niña está solicitando un crédito para pagar los gastos de operación ya que la van intervenir quirúrgica mente de emergencia.

Pide el apoyo a los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel le otorguen este préstamo para pagar dichos gastos ya que con su salario no puede cubrirlo por ser demasiados costosos y así poder curar a su niña de la enfermedad que padece.
texts.en:
Yader Eulogio is a young man originally from a district located 20 km from the municipality of El Sauce, where there is no electricity service, just water drawn from rivers and springs.

He is the father of a daughter, whom he has tried to provide with the best living conditions. He has achieved this by working as a primary school teacher in the same community. 

With the aim of improving his daughter's health, he is requesting a loan to pay for the costs of an operation, since she is going to have emergency surgery. 

He is asking for support from the Kiva investors so that Ceprodel will provide him with this loan in order to pay these expenses. He can't cover them with his salary because they are too costly, and in this way he will be able to cure his daughter of the illness that she is suffering from.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's surgery.

loans.name: Hogla Sarai

texts.es: Doña Hogla de 35 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos de 12, 7 y 1 año de edad ella tiene una tortilleria en su lugar de residencia trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela ya que le da un buen trato a sus clientes y es muy limpia a la hora de elaborarlas, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir los gastos de su hogar y otras necesidades que se le puedan presentar, Doña Hogla esta solicitando un credito que le permita comprar mas maiz pues es lo que mas ocupa para la elaboracion de sus tortillas y asi poder tener a sus clientes satisfechos y ella pueda tener mejores ganancias para darle lo mejor a su familia sin ninguna limitacion.
texts.en:
Hogla is 35 years old. She lives with her husband and three children aged 12, 7 and 1. 

She has a tortilla shop in her place of residence and she works Monday to Sunday. She has lots of customers because she treats them very well and keeps everything clean when she makes her tortillas. 

With the profits she earns from her sales, she manages to cover the household expenses and other necessities that come up. Hogla is applying for a loan so she can buy corn as that is what she uses the most of to make tortillas. In this way she can keep her customers happy and earn better profits to give her family the best, with no limitations.

loans.use: to buy raw material for making tortillas

loans.name: Sadia

texts.en:
Sadia is 34 years-old and lives in Paynesville South which is one of the populated areas in Montserrado County.  She is married and her husband is a doctor.  Together they have two children who live at home, a three-month-old and a four-year-old who is at school.

For the past five years, she has been selling charcoal in the local market. She makes lots of profit and has increasing customers, therefore, she is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business.  

Her future plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: María Benita

texts.es:
María Benita es una sauceña valiente, trabajadora y admirable, típico de las mujeres Nicaragüenses que a pesar de ser madre soltera ha luchado día a día con el esfuerzo propio por sacar adelante a sus tres hijos sin la ayuda del padre.

Para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y pagar la universidad de sus hijos ella labora como secretaria para una Institución estatal donde lleva muchos años de desempeñar esta actividad y la que le ha permitido que a sus hijos no les falte nada.

Uno de sus grandes sueños es que Dios le permita ver preparados a sus hijos profesionalmente para que puedan defenderse en un futuro y esto va a depender en gran medida que los inversionistas de Kiva le financie un crédito que está necesitando en estos momentos a través de Ceprodel para pagar la matrícula de inicio de clases y el arancel de varios meses de la universidad con el fin de que esto no sea un obstáculo para que su hijo culmine su carrera.
texts.en:
María Benita is a "sauceña" [a woman from El Sauce] who is brave, hard-working and admirable, and a typical Nicaraguan woman, who in spite of being a single mother has worked hard day after day to help her three children get ahead through her own efforts, without help from their father. 

To earn her household's daily bread and to pay for her children's university studies, she works as a secretary for a State institution. She has exercised this profession for many years, and it has allowed her to ensure that her children do not lack for anything. 

[She says that] one of her great dreams is that God will permit her to see her children educated as professionals, so that they can be successful in the future. This will depend in great measure on the Kiva investors' financing a loan which she needs at this time, through Ceprodel, to pay the matriculation fees for the start of classes and the tuition for several months of the university, so that this will not be an obstacle for her son as he finishes his degree.

loans.use: to pay for matriculation and university tuition.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en: Nelly is 30 years old and lives in Paynesville, which is one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and her husband is a builder. Nelly and her husband have two children aged 3 and 8 years old, who are currently in school and live at home. For the past 3 years Nelly has been selling cool water and soft drinks in the local market. She makes a lot of profit and has many customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cool water and soft drinks for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more cool water and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, baking flour, frying oil, cereals. etc.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en:
Robinah is a business lady who lives in the Mariakani area. She runs a rental house business which has been in operation for the last three years. She has three children.

Robinah was introduced to Milango by her friends and she joined to access credit. She is therefore asking for a loan of 41,850 Kenya shillings to complete the construction of her house by installing windows, doors and other fittings. she expects to get more income once they are complete and she leases them out for rent.

loans.use: to install windows, doors and other fittings.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 52 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Leah is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for pigs.

Leah has been raising pigs for 8 years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for pigs.

loans.name: Kangni

texts.fr: Kangni est un jeune homme de 36ans. Marié à une revendeuse, ils ont un enfant de 02ans qui ne va pas pour l’instant à l’école. En 2011, il a démarré la vente des produits de beauté, activité qu’il mène avec joie car il l’aide à s’épanouir et à assurer les  besoins de la famille. La demande devient de plus en plus croissante et manquant de fonds pour répondre aux clients, il fait un premier crédit à WAGES pour atteindre son objectif. Comme perspectives d ‘avenir, il espère ouvrir une boutique car actuellement il expose ses marchandises sur étalage et assurer au mieux les besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Kangni, aged 36, is a young man, married to a reseller.  Kangni and his wife have a two-year-old child who does not go to school yet.  

In 2011, Kangni started to sell beauty products, an activity which he is happily involved in since it helps him to develop, professionally, and to meet his family's needs.

As Kangni is now facing an increasing demand, but he lacks the funds to meet his customers' needs, he is requesting a first loan from WAGES, in order to reach his goal.

In the future, he would like to open a shop, since he currently displays his goods on a stall.  He also wants to do his best to meet his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Dédé

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale, Dédé âgée de 25ans est célibataire et n’as pas d’enfants en charge. Elle exerce l’activité à domicile et sollicite son premier crédit pour acheter plus de marchandises. Le profit tiré de la vente l’aidera à ouvrir d’autres boutiques et assurer au mieux à ses besoins. Elle a une ancienneté de 02ans dans l’activité.
texts.en:
Dédé, aged 25, resells general food products.  She is single, without any children in her care.  She works from home and is requesting her first loan to buy more goods.

The profit from the sale of her merchandise will help her to open other shops and to completely support herself.  She has been involved in this activity for two years.

loans.use: to buy general food products.

loans.name: Gorman Alexander

texts.es:
Don Gorman pertenece al municipio de  Niquinohomo, municipio que fue elegido para el programa de creación de alianzas para el fortalecimiento de las capacidades locales para el saneamiento de Nicaragua.

 Gorman casado, con  31 años de edad, comerciante, posee una pequeña pulpería desde hace 3 años. Su núcleo familiar lo conforman su esposa y sus dos hijos que son menores de edad. 
 
Actualmente están aplicando para el proyecto de agua y saneamiento, a través de  un financiamiento para   instalar un  sistema Econosan 1 ML1,100 sin cerramiento, consiste en la instalación de un inodoro convencional con la construcción de sistema de tratamiento, esto lo requiere  ya que por donde el habita no es posible el acceso a aguas negras, por lo que para su uso la familia cuenta con una  letrina, siendo su familia una de la miles que no tienen acceso al  saneamiento mejorado.

con este proyecto que esta beneficiando a varios municipios del país, le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida  y  también contribuir con el medio ambiente. 


Sin la oportunidad de este crédito es imposible que Gorman tenga acceso a un inodoro ya que es muy costoso. Con su bajo ingreso es imposible que logre instalar, estos programas vienen ayudar a familias en condiciones mas pobres, las letrinas causan enfermedades y contaminan el medio ambiente, es por ello que nace la idea de crear estas soluciones dirigidas al sector más pobres.
texts.en:
Gorman lives in the town of the Niquinohomo, a town that was selected to participate in the program of alliances to strengthen the local capacities for the health of Nicaragua.

Gorman is 31 years old, married, a merchant and has had a small general store for three years.  His family unit includes his wife and two young children.

Currently he is applying for the water and health program through financing from the 1 ML1,100 Econosan system without closure.  It consists of installing a conventional toilet and a treatment system.  This is necessary because it’s not possible to access the sewage system where he lives and currently his family has to use a latrine.  They are one of thousands of families who don’t have access to improved sewage systems.

This project is benefitting various towns in the country.  It allows a better quality of live and also helps the environment.

Without the opportunity for this loan, Gorman will not have access to a toilet because they are very costly.  His low income makes it impossible to install and these programs come to help families in the poorest conditions.  Latrines cause diseases and pollute the environment, so the idea of creating these solutions in the poorest areas was born.

loans.use: to buy a toilet.

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr: Kayi âgée de 36ans vit avec son conjoint enseignant et leurs 03 enfants à Lomé. Les enfants sont âgés de 12,08 et 06ans sont tous scolarisés. Pour contribuer aux besoins de la famille, elle revend depuis 2004 des charbons de bois à domicile. Son approvisionnement se fait à Lomé et dans les villes intérieures du pays. Afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients, elle sollicite un premier crédit à WAGES pour  acheter des sacs de charbons de bois.  Elle espère avoir un magasin de vente de charbon de bois et assurer un avenir meilleur à sa famille.
texts.en:
Kayi, aged 36, lives in Lomé with her husband and her three children.  Her husband is a teacher, and the children are 12, 8 and 6 years old.  All three go to school.

In order to help provide for her family, Kayi has been reselling charcoal from home since 2004.  She stocks up in Lomé and in towns located in the center of the country.

Eager to better meet her customers' needs, Kayi is requesting a first loan from WAGES.  She will use this loan to buy some bags of charcoal.  Her goal is to open a shop where she could sell charcoal, and to provide a better future to her family.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock his clinic.

loans.name: Esther Adilia

texts.es:
Doña Esther, es originaria de Masaya conocida también como ciudad de las flores, es casada, con  23 años de edad,  es comerciante, su familia la componen  3 personas su esposo y su hija menor de edad.

Su negocio consiste en la venta ropa y perfumes por encargo, ella distribuye de forma ambulante, sus clientes son vecinos del barrio y trabajadores del Juzgado de Masaya, esto lo hace desde hace 4 años, a ganado muy buena clientela y la confianza de ellos.

 Doña Esther  adecua su tiempo para salir a vender, de forma ambulante y el cual aprovecha también para cobrar y levantar los pedidos de productos que ella ofrece, ya que también tiene que ver por los oficios de su hogar como toda madre. 


Esther quiere invertir un poco mas en su negocio,  por lo que se acercan meses en las que se mejoran las ventas, empezando por la celebración  del día de las madres.

 En esto momentos esta necesitando un financiamiento  para la comprar de  pantalones de dama, blusas, pantalones de hombre, bóxer de dama y hombre, brasier, talladores surtidos, trajecito de niño y camisetas.

Cabe mencionar que ella quiere darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia y mejor educación a su hija del cual ella esta muy orgullosa de tenerla.
texts.en:
Ester is originally from Masaya, also known as the city of flowers.  She is 23 years old, married, and a merchant.  Her family consists of three people including her husband and young daughter.  She sells clothing and perfumes to order and makes her deliveries on foot.  Her customers are her neighbors and workers from the Masaya court.  She has been doing this for four years and has gained steady customers who trust her.

Ester manages her time to go out and sell on foot and also collects payment and picks up her orders.  She also has to care for the home as a mother.

Ester wants to invest into her business a bit more, because the season where she has the best sales is approaching because of the mother’s day celebrations.

She needs a loan so she can buy ladies’ pants, blouses, men’s pants, ladies’ and men’s boxers, bras, and various sizes of assorted children’s outfit and t-shirts.

She also wants to provide a better quality of life for her family and improve her daughter’s education; she is very proud of her.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Juana Del Socorro

texts.es:
Juana  de 46 años de edad, casada con dos hijos de 16,8 años de edad. Es originaria de Managua, lugar que está ubicado en la zona central de Managua. Juana es una mujer trabajadora, responsables con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gustar disfrutar con su hijos y prepárales comida típica como “ indio viejo’ lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad.

Gracias a su espíritu y sus ganas de salir a adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de cristalería y especies como tasas de vidrio , vasos platos, utensilios de cocina, panas y especies como pimienta, canela, hierva buena, albahaca. Actividad que la desempeña en unos de los mercados de la localidad. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos de cristalería, para que en un futuro no muy  lejano pueda incrementar sus ingresos. Ella dedica unas 10 horas diarias a su actividad. Actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto.  Juana del Socorro agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua. Para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Juana is 46 years old, married, and has two children, ages 16 and 8.  She is originally from Managua, a place in the central part of Managua.  Juana is a hardworking, responsible women with a desire for personal success.  She likes to enjoy her children in her spare time and prepare typical dishes for them, such as “indio viejo.”  Unfortunately she was not able to complete university education because she had to go to work at an early age.  

Thanks to her spirit and desire to get ahead, she sells crystal and things like glass cups, glasses, plates, kitchen utensils, and spices such as pepper, cinnamon, mint, and basil.  She does this at one of the local markets.  She will use the money from this loan to stock her business so that in the near future she can increase her income.  She works 10 hours a day and does it with joy.  Juana del Socorro is grateful for the help from the Kiva lenders who make it possible for people from poor countries like Nicaragua to have a means of dignified work.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: José Omar

texts.es:
Don José  pertenece al municipio de Masaya, cuna de artesanos, casado, con 43 años de edad, de oficio zapatero,  su núcleo familiar lo compone el y su esposa quien es que trabaja en su taller.

Don José empezó como empleado de un taller de zapatería desde hace 10 años, el sintió la necesidad de aprender este oficio y tuvo la iniciativa luego de varios años de tener  su propio  negocio, ya que miraba que el negocio es productivo y llamativo a los ojos de los compradores y que da buenos resultados teniendo en cuenta una buena administración.

empezó  a comprar sus propias herramientas de trabajo, actualmente tiene un pequeño taller de zapatería con 12 trabajadores, se especializa en el calzado dirigido al sexo masculino, ya que considera que son pocos los talleres de zapatería que lo elaboran,  sus productos los comercializa en las ciudades de  Managua, Matagalpa y dos compradores de Masaya los cuales  viajan a Honduras a comercializar los zapatos que el elabora, sus productos son de calidad por lo que durante todo este tiempo ha mantenido la fidelidad de sus clientes,  la materia prima la compra en  puestos específicos  de materiales de zapatería de la localidad. 

 Actualmente esta requiriendo de un  financiamiento para poder comprar cuero, en estos momento se le ha incrementado la demanda por lo que seria de mucha ayuda el crédito para responder a la demanda actual.

 Considera que este préstamo le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos, satisfacer a sus clientes y mantener la fidelidad de lo mismos.
texts.en:
Jose is part of the town of Masaya, the crib of artistry.  He’s 43 years old, married, and is a shoemaker.  His family consists of him and his wife and she also works in the shop.

Jose began working 10 years ago because he felt he needed to learn this trade.  He had initiative to start his own business after several years, once he saw that the business was profitable because he caught the eye of his buyers.  He provides good results, and manages well.

He began buying his own tools and now has a small shoe workshop with 12 employees.  He specializes in men’s shoes because there are few shops that make them.  He sells his products in Managua, Matagua, and to two buyers in Masaya who travel to Honduras to sell the shoes that he makes.  His are quality products and he has maintained his customers’ loyalty.  He buys his raw materials in shoe shop supply stores in his area.

He needs this loan to be able to buy leather because demand is increasing and this loan will be very helpful.  He believes that this loan will help him increase his income and satisfy his customers and keep their loyalty.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy sweets, sugar-coated snacks, chewing gum, bonbons, soft drinks, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Alicia María

texts.es:
Alicia, se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer emprendedora y guerrera, le ha tocado sacar a sus dos hijos adelante debido a que su cónyuge nunca respondió. Motivo que la impulsó a crear su propio negocio. 
Desde joven aprendió el oficio de la confección, por lo cual se dedica a la elaboración de ropa interior y exterior, actividad que alterna con la venta de productos por catálogo. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de tela, hilos, accesorios y productos de belleza. 
Espera que con dicha inversión pueda garantizarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad y mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Alicia is known as an enterprising, hard-working woman who has had to raise her two children alone because her husband never took responsibility.  That is what motivated her to set up her own business.

When she was young she learned how to sew, so she now makes clothing, both outerwear and underwear.  She also sells catalogue products.  At this time, she is requesting a loan to buy fabric, thread, accessories and beauty products through catalogue.  She hopes this investment will guarantee a quality education for her children as well as improve their lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, accessories and beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy shoes.

loans.name: Ángel

texts.es:
Ángel de 60 años de edad, es una campesina, radicada desde hace más de 20 años en el municipio de Caucasia, Antioquia. Se dedica a la cría y engorde pollos como actividad comercial. Desde hace unos meses decidió vender en su casa refrescos y mecatos para complementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Su mayor sueño es ver crecer su negocio, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de un mayor número de pollos, concentrado y surtido para sus ventas.
texts.en:
Ángel, 60, is a farmer who has lived for over 20 years in the municipality of Caucasia, Antioquía.  She raises and sell chickens for a living.  Several months ago she decided also to sell soft drinks and pastries for extra income to improve her lifestyle.

Her greatest goal is to expand her business, so she is requesting a loan to buy more chickens and animal feed, as well as other goods to sell.

loans.use: To buy chickens, animal feed and other goods.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora de 62 años de edad, asegura que una de sus mayores pasiones es bordar, por lo cual se dedicó a la elaboración de acolchados desde su juventud, actividad que sigue realizando y le ha suministrado los recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Gracias a su experiencia y la calidad de sus productos, hoy goza de buena clientela y de reconocimientos por su labor. 
En la actualidad el nivel de pedidos es alto, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de telas e insumos con el fin de cumplir con los pedidos solicitados.
Espera que con dicha inversión, pueda expandir su negocio y ofrecerles a las madres cabeza de familia un empleo digno.
texts.en:
Dora, 62, says that one of her greatest passions is embroidery, so she has been making quilts ever since she was young.  This business has allowed her to earn an income to support her family.  Thanks to her experience and the quality of her products, she now has a good customer base and is known for her work.

Since the volume of orders she has now is high, she is requesting a loan to buy fabric and supplies so she can fill all the orders.

She hopes to expand her business through this investment and would like to offer decent jobs to women who are heads of household.

loans.use: To buy fabric and supplies (thread, needles).

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru: Динара – лидер группы «Ийгилик -3», ей 25 лет, воспитывает 2 детей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Динара занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав с суммы (KGS) 15,000 сом в 2003 году. Благодаря упорному труду,  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2,0 га земли с посевом зерновых культур. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Динара обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 85,000 сом (KGS) , целью которого является покупка бычков на откорм и перепродажу.  Доходы от кредита Динара планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, и в будущем купить еще 2 га земли для посева.
texts.en:
Dinara is the leader of the group "Iigilik - 3". She is 25 years old and raises two children. As the main source of income for her family, Dinara works in animal husbandry and crop farming. She began her business with 15,000 som in 2003 and thanks to persistent work she now has 2 hectares of land planted with crops. 

With the goal of future business development, Dinara turned to the micro-finance bank Bai Tushum and Partners for an 85,000 som loan, with which she plans to purchase steer to feed and resell. Dinara intends to invest the extra income in future development of her business. Eventually she would like to purchase two more hectares for planting.

loans.use: to purchase cattle
